alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval County through 530 PM EDT... At 453 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oceanway, or near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
